markdown.markdown:
This is me working out a wordcloud after failing the **hackerrank** basic R test...

```{r}
tx = "Everything seems to go round above my head,
and within my stomach... The feeling is as if
reality itself was indistinguishable from a dream...
should I be concearned about this? maybe seek for 
professional help? or is this to be expected
when you get fired? Time will tell..."
strsplit(tx, split = ' ')
strsplit(tx, split = '[:blank:]')
strsplit(tx, split = '[ \n]')
strsplit(tx, split = '[ \n]') |> gsub('[?.]', '', x = _)
strsplit(tx, split = '[ \n]') |> gsub('[?.]', '', x = _) |> as.character()
tx_bw = strsplit(tx, split = '[ \n]')
gsub('[?.]', '', tx_bw)
vec_gsub = Vectorize(gsub)
vec_gsub('[?.]', '', tx_bw)
vec_gsub('[?.,:;!¿¡]', '', tx_bw)
tx_bw_np = vec_gsub('[?.,:;!¿¡]', '', tx_bw)
nchar(tx_bw_np)
tx_bw_np = as.vector(vec_gsub('[?.,:;!¿¡]', '', tx_bw), mode = 'character')
tx_bw_np
nchar(tx_bw_np)
n = nchar(tx_bw_np)
tx_bw_np_n = tx_bw_np[n >= 5 & n <= 10]
tx_bw_np_n
tx_bw_np_n = tolower(tx_bw_np[n >= 5 & n <= 10])
tx_bw_np_n
grepl('reality', tx_bw_np_n)
any(grepl('reality', tx_bw_np_n))
any(grepl('real', tx_bw_np_n))
any(grepl('real', tx_bw_np_n, fixed = TRUE))
any(grepl('real', tx_bw_np_n))
any('real' %in% tx_bw_np_n)
any('reality' %in% tx_bw_np_n)
word = c('reality', 'baloon', 'itself')
any(word %in% tx_bw_np_n)
'reality' %in% tx_bw_np_n
```
